title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces in Build 200110251.
OB: When intermixing tabs and spaces in a default text editor, typing <space><tab>some text<tab>some text2.
EB: After highlighting the two lines above and executing the ShiftLeft action, the selected lines do not move or shift as expected.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type <space><tab>some text<tab>some text2.
3. Highlight the two lines above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft action.

Expected result: The selected lines should be indented or shifted to the left.

Actual result: The selected lines do not move.
